member.summary: Gets the Ifc Schema version of the model if this is IFC schema

member.name: M:Xbim.Ifc4x3.GeometryResource.IfcDirection.op_Implicit(Xbim.Common.Geometry.XbimVector3D)~Xbim.Ifc4x3.GeometryResource.IfcDirection
member.summary: Do not use this conversion operator unless you are absolutely sure you know what you do. Resulting object is not a properpart of the model and will throw an exception if you try to modify it or anything. It is only used in IfcGeometricRepresentationSubContext.TrueNorth where derived attribute is returned in derived overwriting attribute.
